metadata.title: CVE-2024-2614 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: Memory safety bugs present in Firefox 123, Firefox ESR 115.8, andThunderbird 115.8. Some of these bugs showed evidence of memory corruptionand we presume that with enough effort some of these could have beenexploited to run arbitrary code. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 124,Firefox ESR < 115.9, and Thunderbird < 115.9.

criterions.comment: thunderbird package in noble is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs102 package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
